article_title: Delusion and Moxie, Rove and Jindal
article_text: Politics may not be for the faint of heart, but it's often for the deluded of mind. Today's meme is about those who are deluding either themselves or others, and will inevitably have their hopes dashed by cruel reality. We start with Karl Rove, who went on Fox News Sunday and said that despite all that talk about Hillary Clinton and traumatic brain injuries, "Look, I'm not questioning her health." Sure, OK.

og.title: Dally Meme: Delusion and Moxie, Rove and Jindal

article_summary:
We start with Karl Rove, who went on Fox News Sunday and said that despite all that talk about Hillary Clinton and traumatic brain injuries, "Look, I'm not questioning her health."
Today's meme is about those who are deluding either themselves or others, and will inevitably have their hopes dashed by cruel reality.
Politics may not be for the faint of heart, but it's often for the deluded of mind.
